title: AKS Auto Mode Cluster Values
description: Values for configuring an AKS cluster provisioned via Terraform through Flux.

resource_group_name.description: Azure Resource Group name for the AKS cluster.

region.description: Azure region for the AKS cluster.

dns_prefix.description: Unique DNS prefix for the AKS cluster.

agent_pool_name.description: Name for the default agent pool.

agent_vm_size.description: VM size for the AKS agent nodes.

agent_count.description: Number of nodes in the default agent pool.

service_principal_client_id.description: Client ID for the Azure Service Principal used by AKS.

service_principal_client_secret.description: Client Secret for the Azure Service Principal used by AKS.

resource_tags.description: Tags to apply to Azure resources.

path.description: Path to the Terraform configuration within the Git repository.

destroyResourcesOnDeletion.description: Destroy Terraform resources when the Helm release is deleted.

alwaysCleanupRunnerPod.description: Always clean up the Terraform runner pod.

affinity.description: Affinity rules for the Terraform runner pod.

tolerations.description: Tolerations for the Terraform runner pod.
